channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Security Identity Manager Adapters
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Security Identity Manager Adapters

item.title: CVE-2021-20572|2024-09-16T17:38:01.836Z -- ibm -- security%20identity%20manager%20adapters
item.description: IBM Security Identity Manager Adapters 6.0 and 7.0 are vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking. A remote authenticated attacker could overflow the and cause the server to crash. IBM X-Force ID: 199247.
